talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why the rush when you made me come so suddenly?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Hey there, stop.
Where are you rushing to? Come here for a second, I've got something to tell you.
Can't you move faster?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A case?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
You should come as quickly as you can, when I, the future soldier of the Army of Destruction, is calling you.
Anyway, it looks to be some kind of report. You take care of it.
It'd be a waste of my talents to get involved in such a trivial case, wouldn't it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Just ignore it, then.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
It’s about a fish thief or something... But of course I didn't want to waste my time reading the report.
I couldn't care less about a petty thief.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why does it have to be me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
But my boss who's yet to discover my talents keeps ordering me around.
I promise I will join the Army of Destruction someday and order him around as much as I want.
But for now, there is an order, which I can't disobey. So you go and take care of it for me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>All right, all right. I will take care of it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Don't talk back and do as you're told!
Remember your place. You're nothing but an ordinary adventurer. Don't you know who I am? Huh?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I know, I know.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Don’t pull a long face!
Follow my orders now and I’ll take good care of you when I join the Army of Destruction.
You should know that I’m going very easy on you...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Case Log 1. The Fish Trail$</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
If you come and flatter me after I've joined the Army of Destruction, it'll be too late.
Get this job done now and I’ll remember you later. Be grateful for that.

※ Investigate the truth behind this case from Fish Seller Mona, who has got her fish stolen.

$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
You can see Mona's fish shop from here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm here because you filed a <FONT color=#a82424>theft report</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Fresh fish straight from the sea!
Welcome, pick whatever you want.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Could you give me the details on how the fish got stolen?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Oh! So you've come for that. But you ain't a guard from Merca, are you?
I thought they'd send me one of their guards, who's also a detective.
Well... I guess all guards from Merca must be busy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It could be that the suspect is after money.</html>
<html>It is highly probable that the suspect is someone who knows how valuable your fish are.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Hm... The first time my fish disappeared was a week ago.
They were gone while I left the shop empty for a moment to make a delivery.
And they were not cheap ones.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Just two? That's strange.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
But they were just two fish and nothing more.
You can’t earn much with that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Can you tell me why you think so?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
If the suspect knew the fish's value, he or she wouldn't have stolen them,
but paid their full price.
The suspect is just a low thief!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't tell me you forgot you had sold them?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
It's been the same since then. One or two fish gone.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course... It can’t be that something’s wrong with your memory... Now, it would be difficult to solve this case since we don’t have any clues.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Oh dear! Don't tell me you’re having doubts about a merchant’s memory!
As long as Vernicka is around in Merca, something like that will never happen.
It applies to all merchants that any wrong information equals closing their business.
It means the END.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Anything is fine. Tell me everything!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
What else should I tell you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you have any delivery to make today?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Let me see... Since a week ago until now, around two fish have been disappearing each day.
They were always the freshest ones.
I left the shop empty only for about 30 minutes to make a delivery, that’s all.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hm... Why don’t we try an <FONT color=#a82424>undercover investigation</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Yes, I do! There are so many fishing boats and cargo ships around here recently that I’m getting lots of fresh fish.
We are getting endless orders too.
I have to make a delivery to the Headquarters soon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Make a delivery as you always do.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Undercover investigation? Can we catch the suspect with that?
What shall I do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will hide over there and watch.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
I hope I don't lose any fish today.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Leave this to me!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
That sounds great!
Then I'll leave this to you, {user_nick}! I can leave the shop with my mind at ease now.
Please take care of the shop for me!

$Fish Seller Mona$
Please catch the thief for me!

$Guard Chiffe$
It'd be a waste of my talents to catch a mere fish thief. That's for sure.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Perfect! I can see the shop clearly from here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
Hide behind the bench and observe Mona's shop.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Continue observing.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
Crouch beside the bench to hide yourself and observe the shop.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Observe for a bit longer.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
No one is approaching Mona's shop.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Maybe the suspect will appear when Mona's back.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
A passerby stops for a moment, then leaves the shop when he notices that Mona isn't around.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Observe till the end.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
No one suspicious passes by.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Grele? What are you doing here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Grele$
What are you doing here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did you let others know that you're coming here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Grele$
I was looking for someone who might know anything about my sister.
This place is packed with people these days.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, that sounds great…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Grele$
Yeah, I told Norfe…
I promised I won't stay outside for long.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No one came to your shop.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
{user_nick}, I'm back.
Did you catch the thief?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't create trouble and be careful.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Grele$
I've got to go… Bye.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, you don’t have to worry about him. Anyway, your fish are all safe.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
And who was he…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Really? Maybe the thief noticed someone was watching…
But I’m relieved to hear that. Let's head to the shop together.

$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
※ Go to the shop with Mona and check if any fish got stolen.

$Guard Chiffe$
It'd be a waste of my talents to catch a mere fish thief. That's for sure.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? What is it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Now, let's see... Huh? What?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's strange. I was watching nonstop…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Did you do your job properly?
The fish that I had spread out over there to dry are gone.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll make sure I catch the thief.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
But is this even possible? In such a brief moment…
Now we seriously need an official detective to investigate this case, don't you think?
{user_nick}, do me a favour and please arrange a real detective to be sent here.
Another theft has occurred under your watch. Doesn’t that prove you’re not capable enough to take this case?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't worry. In the name of my grandfather, I'll catch the thief!</html>
<html>Don't worry. The culprit must be here!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Are you sure? Can you really do that?
But the person stole the fish even when you were watching.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ha ha. I just said that to boost my confidence.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Your grandfather?
Who is he?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The thief must still be at Merca's Port, since it happened within such a short period of time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Here...? But where…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Since it happened before my eyes, it'll be easier to find the necessary clues.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Can you really catch the thief?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, trust me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
Please catch the thief.
I'm leaving this to you, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Receive Reward)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Fish Seller Mona$
I don't know who this thief is, but I will beat the person… into a pulp!!!

journal.title: Investigation Begins
journal.contents:
Ask Fish Seller Mona about how her fish got stolen.

Merca's Port - Fish Seller Mona
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Fish Seller Mona at Merca's Port.

journal.title: Undercover Investigation
journal.contents:
Start an undercover investigation and see if anyone suspicious approaches the fish shop.

Merca's Port - ??
journal.todo_msg: Find a spot suitable to make your undercover investigation.

journal.title: The Stolen Fish
journal.contents:
Return to the Fish Shop with Fish Seller Mona.

Merca's Port - Fish Seller Mona
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Fish Seller Mona at Merca's Port.
